## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description           | Type     | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | --------------------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `color`  | `color`   | The color of the icon | `string` | `"black"`   |
| `name`   | `name`    | The name of the icon  | `string` | `undefined` |
| `size`   | `size`    | The size of the icon  | `string` | `undefined` |
